title: Review QBFT reference test schema

labels.name: TeamGroot
labels.description: GH issues worked on by Groot Team

body:
Review QBFT reference tests schema that will be used to define the QBFT reference tests

**Tasks**
* Review the QBFT reference tests schema and provide feedback to the DDS team
* Possibly spike the test runner if it makes it easier to review

The proposed schema https://github.com/ConsenSysQuorum/IBFTDesign/blob/reference_tests/reference_tests/reftest_schema.json

This is a partial model based on the spec

![partial model from ref.png](https://images.zenhubusercontent.com/5e7019978ec11b7684ec1dd8/137ec2d7-f26b-48b8-b4e8-2fc065529ecb)
We have created #3460 to implement a prototype test execution engine.
